languages.text: {n}Одна мысль о прогулке по нижним палубам ранит ваши {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}благородные органы чувств{/d}. Вы явственно представляете, как грязь и нищета витают в воздухе, сочатся из каждой трещины и пытаются пробраться под кожу.{/n}

{n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одна мысль о прогулке по нижним палубам ранит ваши {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}благородные органы чувств{/d}. Вы явственно представляете, как грязь и нищета витают в воздухе, сочатся из каждой трещины и пытаются пробраться под кожу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Stell dir nur vor, wie ein Aufenthalt auf den unteren Decks deinen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}geschärften Sinnen{/d} schaden würde. Vor deinem geistigen Auge bilden sich lebhafte Bilder von Schmutz und Armut, die aus jedem Riss kriechen und sich durch deine Haut fressen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Stell dir nur vor, wie ein Aufenthalt auf den unteren Decks deinen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}geschärften Sinnen{/d} schaden würde. Vor deinem geistigen Auge bilden sich lebhafte Bilder von Schmutz und Armut, die aus jedem Riss kriechen und sich durch deine Haut fressen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'idée même de déambuler sur les ponts inférieurs agresse vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sens raffinés{/d}. Votre esprit est soudain assailli d'images frappantes : saleté et pauvreté flottant dans l'air, s'infiltrant par la moindre fissure, rongeant votre peau...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'idée même de déambuler sur les ponts inférieurs agresse vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sens raffinés{/d}. Votre esprit est soudain assailli d'images frappantes : saleté et pauvreté flottant dans l'air, s'infiltrant par la moindre fissure, rongeant votre peau...{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mera idea de pasearte por las cubiertas inferiores ofende tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refinados gustos{/d}. Tu mente evoca vívidas imágenes de la pobreza e inmundicia que impregnan el aire, rezuman de cada grieta y te carcomen la piel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mera idea de pasearte por las cubiertas inferiores ofende tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refinados gustos{/d}. Tu mente evoca vívidas imágenes de la pobreza e inmundicia que impregnan el aire, rezuman de cada grieta y te carcomen la piel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}下層デッキを歩き回ると想像するだけで、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}磨き上げられた感覚{/d}が疼く。不潔と貧困が空気中に漂い、あらゆる隙間から染み出し、皮膚を蝕むイメージが鮮明に脳裏をよぎる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}下層デッキを歩き回ると想像するだけで、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}磨き上げられた感覚{/d}が疼く。不潔と貧困が空気中に漂い、あらゆる隙間から染み出し、皮膚を蝕むイメージが鮮明に脳裏をよぎる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}哪怕仅仅是想象在底层甲板行走的场面，就会刺激到你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}精致的感官{/d}。你脑海里栩栩如生地浮现出了贫穷不堪、污秽横行的画面。这些东西悬在空气中，从每条裂缝里渗出来，啃噬着你的皮肤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哪怕仅仅是想象在底层甲板行走的场面，就会刺激到你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}精致的感官{/d}。你脑海里栩栩如生地浮现出了贫穷不堪、污秽横行的画面。这些东西悬在空气中，从每条裂缝里渗出来，啃噬着你的皮肤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alt güvertelerde dolaşırken karşılaşacağın manzaraları düşünmek bile {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}zarif hislerine{/d} zarar veriyor. Zihnin, ortama hâkim olan pisliğin ve sefaletin en ufak bir çatlaktan bile sızarak derini kemirip durduğu, capcanlı görüntüleri gözlerinin önüne getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just thinking about the prospect of walking around the lower decks wounds your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}refined senses{/d}. Your mind conjures vivid images of filth and poverty hanging in the air, seeping out of every crack, gnawing their way through your skin.{/n}
